name: K.G.F-Official Game
description:
Yash trapped by villains in K.G.F with revolving trolleys on tracks, and you must help Rocky (Yash) to come out this. ! Rocky started capturing local gangs and his aim to be king of K.G.F! Almost while reaching the goal he trapped in this goldmines underground. Quickly act and jump to the next track and avoid trolleys those are circulating on different tricky patterns set up by the villains Quick 5 hops will add you bonus score, clear as many as traps as you can and achieve the highest score among your friends.

KGF game is a hyper-casual game with unique levels.

Features:
1. KGF real Underground
2. 50 unique levels
3. Powers ups to boost up
4. Easy to understand and hard to master
5. Difficulty increases the level on level
